author: 紅月阿
txt_content:
严重 Could not pass event PlayerInteractEvent to BlockHunt v0.1.5_ALPH

咋办。。。。PlayerInteractEvent究竟是什么


为何躲猫猫插件和它不兼容？

replies.author: 玩手游
replies.txt_content: 换个服务端内核就好了！

replies.author: www123456加星
replies.txt_content: PlayerInteractEvent应该是Player Interact Event你出?的打错鸟中文:玩家互动活动.{:10_492:}

replies.author: www123456加星
replies.txt_content: PlayerInteractEvent应该是Player Interact Event你出?的打错鸟中文:玩家互动活动.{:10_492:}
